attributes.action: Qaddiyani are not Muslims and should not be classified as Muslims
attributes.additional_details:
We Muslims of the UK, humbly request that the group known as Ahmedis/Qaddiyanis not be classified as Muslims. It is an insult to the religion of Islam.

this is the group which claims their is another prophet after our beloved messenger Muhammad peace be upon him.

we request their categorisation is changed to non muslims or whatever you deem fit.
